name: Successful retrofit strategies for big buildings
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Many different strategies are required when assessing whether and how best to retrofit a building. This seminar explores the issues with case studies of four very different building challenges.

presentations.name: Better Buildings Partnership (BBP) - case study exercise for multi-tenanted buildings.
presentations.speakers: Neil Pennell, Head of Sustainability & Engineering, Land Securities

presentations.name: The Strand Palace Hotel (built c. 1925-30)
presentations.speakers: David Maxwell, Investment Analyst, Sustainable Development Capital LLP

presentations.name: Elizabeth II Court. Retrofit of 1960s building as new HQ for Hampshire Country Council.
Retrofit of a modernist 1970s building, University of Cambridge
